name: Institute for Ethics
goal: The future society can be based only on knowledge, values and ethics. It is important to reduce the gap between declared values and actual behavior.
interests: Education, Information Society, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
Institute for ethics is has been successfully running a sustainable program Winning with Values on ethics and values in kindergartens and primary schools in Slovenia for 4 years now. The program offers support and tools for teaching and reinforcing ethics and basic human values among children and youths. The program is based on our scientific document The Framework of Ethics and Values. It is an evidence-based framework derived from historical and cultural bases of European values and ethics, as well as from major contemporary scientific value models.

Institute for ethics has prepared a project Role Model for kindergartens and schools in European Union. We believe that our good results and achievements could be successfully implemented in educational practice on the EU level.

More about our project and work is available on http://www.iev.si and http://www.rolemodel.eu
